description:
Various factors will dominate the energy supply in the years to come: the drive toward renewable energy and the resulting need to expand and upgrade grid infrastructures. MVDC is a new portfolio element of Siemens AG which is based on well- known HVDC transmission technique scaled for long distance MVDC transmission applications. Our DC connection application allows us to provide an MV solution that increases power transfer capability while minimizing losses at the same times.Siemens' DC connection application is not only a realistic technical and economic alternative to AC technology, but also the solution for medium and regional power transmission.

Possible scenarios are:
- Connection of islands to mainland to avoid
high maintenance and high cost for diesel /
localgenerator backup
- Grid connection of small communities in
sparselypopulated regions
- Connection of weak distribution grids
irrespective of voltage and frequency
name: MVDC Connection Technology for Efficient Medium Power Transmission

description:
In this training session, Mr. Erhard Sonnenberg from Customer Services provides an insight into Voltage Transformer Measurements.

Voltage Transformers (VT) - as part of Gas-Insulated Switchgear (GIS) - are one of the most important components in each substation of an energy transmission and distribution system. Voltage transformers secure a safe and reliable energy supply without interruption.

GIS that were manufactured between 1968 and 1978 (8D1/8D2 double pressure) are equipped with the VT-type VMK. That type is cast-resin insulated (first generation) and might have voids, cracks or other defects of the isolation due to the very long service time and production technology of the early 1970?s that might result in a fatal failure with high resulting costs for repair and long delivery times.

Offline VT-Measurements help identifying the affected components.
name: CS Sales Training - Voltage Transformer Measurement

This lecture will introduce the new application ?Fault Localization inthe Cloud (FLiC)?, which is targeting at smaller utilities
respecting their business situation.

Due to cost reasons they do not run a control centre or have a verysmall one, not able to handle the additional information of a vast number of fault indicators in the medium-voltagedistribution grid.

Today, this causes as lot of hidden cost to identify the fault locationby patrolling the grid structure.

FLiC enables any mobile device to get notified in case of grid faultsand with a browser view to see the faulty section including GPS coordinates.

Benefits are a reduction of down times, cost reduction per fault andincreased satisfaction of affected consumers.

description:
As a result of increasing penetration of fluctuatingrenewable energy current MV grids need to change. Grid design will play a hugepart in addressing the associated challenges by intermeshing systems to enablemore flexibility of power flows and allow generated power to be used closer tothe demand at the time. This is where Medium Voltage Direct Current (MVDC)solutions can play a part. Beyond just reactive power compensation emerging inthe MV environment, there are also benefits to being able to actively movepower from one network to another, thus helping to balance all networkparameters. SIPLINK provides a solution to do this and it can be easilydemonstrated that where reinforcement up-to sub-transmission levels arerequired, along with greater control; DC can provide significant benefits overthe lifetime of a network asset?s operation.

Speaker: Bridgit Hartland-Johnson (EMMS PA APS)
name: SIPLINK ? Siemens MVDC solution for active power flow control on distribution level

description:
A time-efficient and cost-effective power supply solution E-Houses are customized, fully equipped and pre-tested modular power substations for a fast and reliable power supply. They accommodate our comprehensive portfolio of medium-voltage switchgear, low-voltage switchboards and busbar trunking systems, auxiliary equipment, etc.
The E-Houses are completely developed, manufactured, assembled and pre-tested at the factory, and installed, connected and put into operation on site. They are therefore fast and easy to install and can be used as an interim solution. They are easy to upgrade, using available space optimally. This makes them a time-efficient and cost-effective alternative to conventional site-built substations for a broad range of applications.

description: Distributed power generation, fluctuating peak times, an increasing number of consumers who are also producers (prosumers), an aging infrastructure, and constantly changing political frameworks ? power distribution grids are subject to demanding challenges.
name: Why Distribution Grid Applications?

description: Verteilte Energieerzeugung, schwankende Spitzenzeiten, eine steigende Anzahl an Energieverbrauchern die gleichzeitig auch Energie produzieren (sog. Prosumer), eine alternde Infrastruktur, konstant wechselnde politische Rahmenbedingungen ? Energieverteilnetze stehen vor anspruchsvollen Herausforderungen.
name: Warum Verteilnetzapplikationen?

description: Dieses Video beschreibt die Funktionalität der Sales APP, um die Präsentation von Verteilnetzanwendungen zu unterstützen.
name: Distribution Grid Application - Wie funktioniert die App

description: This video describes the functionalityof the sales APP tosupport the presentation of distribution grid applications.
name: Distribution-Grid-Applications-How-to-use-the APP-EN

description:
Securityand Cyber Security are important issues for criticalinfrastructures such as power distribution grids.

The distribution grid operator has to fulfillgovernmental regulations and security standards.
name: Cyber security brief introduction

description: Sicherheit und Cybersicherheit sind wichtige Aspekte für kritische Infrastrukturen wie Stromverteilnetze. Der Verteilnetzbetreiber muss behördliche Bestimmungen und Sicherheitsstandards erfüllen.
name: Cyber Security - kurze Einführung

description: Local and remote fault signaling and manual restoration solutions are available for cable and overhead line grids.
name: Local and remote fault signaling and manual restoration

description: SchnelleErkennung und Lokalisierung von Störungen zur zügigen Wiederverorgung
name: Lokale und ferngesteuerte Störungsmeldungen für die manuelle Wiederversorgung

description: Acost-efficient solution that also provides the basis for advanced outage management
name: Identify outages with the remote monitoring and control of secondary stations

description: Einekosteneffiziente Lösung, auch als Basis für das erweiterte Ausfallmanagement
name: Fernüberwachung und -steuerung von Ortsnetzstationen

description: Automated switching for ultra-fast service restoration
name: Self-healing solutions for supply restoration

description: AutomatisiertesSchalten für die ultraschnelle Instandsetzung
name: Selbstheilende Lösungen für die Wiederherstellung der Stromversorgung

description: SCADA /OMS integrated with advanced monitoring fault location applications
name: Services quickly restored thanks to SCADA / OMS integration

description: SCADA /OMS integriert mit fortschrittlichen Applikationen zur Überwachung undLokalisierung von Störungen
name: Schnelle Wiederverorgung mit integriertem SCADA / OMS

description: What are the benefits of advancedSCADA / OMS integration with advanced metering?
name: Advanced SCADA / OMS integration with advanced metering

description: Was sind die Vorteile der modernen SCADA/OMS- mit Integration von Smart Metern?
name: SCADA/OMS-Integration mit Smart Metering

description: In the context of efficient grid operation, real-time state estimationis a significant feature to calculate the grid status for non-equipped minisubstations between equipped ones.
name: Advanced monitoring with Real Time State Estimation

description: Im Kontext eines effizienten Netzbetriebs ist dieEchtzeit-Zustandseinschätzung ein wichtiges Mittel, um den Netzstatus für nichtmesstechnisch ausgerüstete Netzstationen zwischen ausgerüsteten Stationen zuberechnen.
name: Erweiterte Überwachung mit Echtzeitstatuseinschätzung

description: In the operation of grids, both technical and nontechnical losses are typical phenomena.
name: Detection of technical and nontechnical losses

description: Im Betrieb von Stromnetzen sind technische undnicht-technische Verluste typische Phänomene.
name: Erkennung von technischen und nichttechnischen Verlusten

description: Utilities have to have more focus on harmonic disturbances caused by distributed energy resources in the near future.
name: Optimized power quality management system

description: Netzbetreiber müssen künftig stärker harmonische Belastungen durch dezentrale Erzeugung beobachten.
name: appOptimiertes Power Quality Management System

description: Tools for real-time monitoring are indispensable when it comes to mastering the new challenges in distribution grid operation. Volt/Var management and control is a solution that enables the measurement of voltage band violations and overload situations and the control of nominal versus actual value.
name: Optimization of Volt/Var conditions

description: Werkzeuge für das Echtzeit Monitoring sind unverzichtbar, wenn es darum geht die neuen Herausforderungen beim Betrieb der Verteilnetze zu meistern. Volt/Var Management und Steuerung ist eine Lösung, die es ermöglicht Spannungsbandverletzungen und Überlastsituationen aufzuzeigen und mittels Sollwertvorgaben zu vermeiden.
name: Optimierung von Volt/Var Bedingungen

description: Phase asymmetries can have a negative impact on operating equipment and on loads such as motors. The detection of asymmetries in loads and in sensors connected with the phase transposed is often difficult as well as time-intensive.
name: Validation of asset phase assignment

description: Phasenasymmetrien können negative Auswirkung auf Betriebsmittel und Verbraucher wie zum Beispiel Motoren haben. Oft ist das Auffinden von Asymmetrien bei Lasten und phasenvertauscht angeschlossenen Sensoren vor Ort schwierig und zeitintensiv.
name: Phasenbelegung von Betriebsmitteln validieren

description: A data model in which all operating equipment and their connections to other equipment (switches, transformers, bus bars, etc.) are stored exists for every distribution grid. Corresponding data models are updated in the control center. This results in minor errors and discrepancies which are unavoidable in view of the large volumes of data, and in some cases are not even noticed.
name: Validation of asset connectivity

description: Es existiert für jedes Verteilnetz ein Datenmodell, in dem alle Betriebsmittel und ihre Verbindungen zu anderen Betriebsmitteln (Schalter, Trafos, Sammelschienen etc.) hinterlegt sind. Entsprechende Datenmodelle werden im Netzleitsystem gepflegt. Dabei kommt es zu kleinen Fehlern und Abweichungen, die aufgrund der großen Datenmengen nicht zu verhindern sind und teilweise gar nicht bemerkt werden.
name: Validierung der Konnektivität von Betriebsmitteln

description:
Identify load on distribution transformers to intervene before an overload occurs
Monitoring grid status and asset performance
name: Methods for planning maintenance and remaining equipment lifetime determination

description: Analysen von Kosten früherer Projekte zeigten, dass die meisten Kosten im Engineering Prozess entstanden.
name: IT/OT Integration

description: The development of renewable energy sources is leading to a situation where photovoltaic (PV) systems also account for an increasingly large proportion of the power supply.
name: Detection of PV inverters with wrong QV characteristic

description: Typically the distribution grid is operated as a number of branches even they could be infeed from both sides or as a meshed grid. In various critical load situations shifting of the normal open point will help to balance the load on the both branches.
name: Automated switching for dynamic reconfiguration

description: Normalerweise wird das Verteilnetz als Strahlennetz, bestehend aus offenen Ringen betrieben. Diese können von beiden Seiten gespeist oder als vermaschtes Netz betrieben werden. In kritischen Lastsituationen kann durch verschieben der Trennstelle innerhalb des Ringes die Last auf beide Einspeisungen optimiert verteilt werden
name: Automatisiertes Schalten für dynamische Neukonfiguration

description: The Siemens Microgrid Controller ensures operational efficiency and security. It balances all components in a way that the whole system runs within the optimum range of operation.
name: Microgrids for remote locations with weak or no connection to the main grid

description: Der Siemens Microgrid Controller gewährleistet Effizienz und Sicherheit im Betrieb. Er balanciert alle Komponenten so aus, dass das gesamte System innerhalb des optimalen Betriebsbereichs läuft.
name: Microgrids für isolierte Standorte mit schwacher oder nicht vorhandener Anbindung an das Hauptnetz

description: Coordinated scheduling and dispatch of distributed energy resources, including energy storage helps tackle overload situations, voltage problems and at least balance generation and load.
name: Control of distributed generation, energy storage, and demand response

description: Die Einplanung und Ansteuerung verteilter Energieerzeuger inklusive Energiespeicher hilft Überlast-Situationen zu vermeiden, Spannungsprobleme zu verhindern und Erzeugung und Verbrauch auszubalancieren
name: Steuerung von verteilter Energieerzeugung, Energiespeicher und Lastmanagement

description: Conservation voltage reduction (CVR) is a low cost solution for distribution system operators to reduce energy consumption and peak demand for short periods
name: Conservation voltage reduction (CVR) to reduce peak loads

description: Spannungsreduktion ist ein kostengünstiges Verfahren für Netzbetreiber um die Leitungsbelastung und die kurzzeitigen Lastspitzen zu reduzieren,
name: Spannungsreduktion um Lastspitzen zu reduzieren

description:
Last auf Verteiltransformatoren identifizieren und Maßnahmen ergreifen, bevor es zu einer Überlastung kommt
Den Netzstatus und die Leistung von Assets überwachen
name: Methoden der Wartungsplanung und Restlebensdauerbestimmung für Betriebsmittel

description: Analyzing projects cost in the past showed the most of the cost are caused within the engineering process.
name: IT/OT integration

description: Der Ausbau regenerativer Energiequellen führt dazu, dass auch Photovoltaik-(PV-)Anlagen einen immer größeren Anteil an der Energieversorgung übernehmen
name: PV-Wechselrichter mit falscher Q-V-Charakteristik aufspüren

name: Power Quality ? 7 things to keep always in mind

description:
The challenge: The energy network is in motion. Decentralized power generation from renewable sources is constantly being expanded and integrated into the distribution grids. Therefore, grid management is facing a host of challenges such as unclear, fluctuating direction of load flow and, more and more often, critical voltage violations or equipment overloads. The solution: Spectrum Power? Active Network Management (ANM) is another smart tool from Siemens for distribution grids. It supports a wide range of equipment ? from transformer tap changers and capacitor banks to controllable loads and generators including battery storage. It displays the current load flow directions and calculated load values as well as voltage range violations and overload situations. Spectrum Power? ANM also provides functions for convenient voltage range and capacity utilization management. Losses can be minimized with distinct voltage, reactive power, and active power control, whether automatically or in manual mode.

Target Group

All Sales Employees as well as all authors of Winning/Fighting Guides

This video describes the main features of the Winning Guide iOS App & Windows 7/10 Desktop Application.

Itexplains how to use the app as well as how to manage and upload Winning/Fighting Guides


Contents

In this live demo Jaren Krchnavi and Clemens Wehner from EM BD&MK Sales Excellence presented the release of the Winning Guide App & Desktop version.
The live demo contains all front- and backend features as well as a small Q&A in the end.


Additional Information:

The Winning Guide App provides a platform for winning/fighting guides to be uploaded and distributed to sales colleagues in the regions. This app especially improves the management of user groups and giving access rights as compared to printed versions. Winning guides provide arguments on why Siemens?portfolio is better than the competition and counter arguments for possible weak points mentioned by the customer. The app is for documents with C1 and C2 level and has protection features included to minimize documents from being shared outside the intended user group e.g. digital watermarks are visible and screenshots has been disabled.


Download Guidelines / Manual

description: In the past Dresser Rand has developed applications outside its core competencies in the Oil&Gas and compressor area, namely in the Waste-to-Energy sector relevant for municipal utilities and a multitude of industrial customers.The presentation will introduce Dresser Rand?s small scale power generation application for landfill (waste disposal) sites and waste water treatment plants using the proven KG2 gas turbine together with the Enercore Power Oxidiser. The technology behind will be explained and benefits and reference projects shown as well.
name: KAM Training@EM - Waste2Energy ? Landfill power generation applications from Dresser Rand

description: The presentation will cover the drivers behind the DSOinvolvement as well as the reasoning behind the City Council interest in the project. These are quite different, but connected through thepotential of Demand Response.A high level technical description of how the system is delivered and anoverview of the issues encountered during project preparation and delivery will also be given.
name: Glasgow Smart Buildings -  A project around building Demand Side Response (DSR) capability

description: Stable grid operation through targeted monitoring and fast control. The challenge: Unpredictability of energy in feed into the distribution grid The solution: Voltage and capacity management including visualization. For further details please see here: \\intranet.wss03.ptd.siemens.de@SSL\DavWWWRoot\content\10006392\MDB_Municipalities_DSOs\Documents\MDB MD - 4 All\MDB MD Lectures - Vortraege\EN\Active_Network_Management\150127_ANM_Flyer_EN.PDF Speaker: Markus Reischboeck (EM DG MG SD)
name: Spectrum Power? Active Network Management

description: As a result of increasing penetration of fluctuatingrenewable energy current MV grids need to change. Grid design will play a hugepart in addressing the associated challenges by intermeshing systems to enablemore flexibility of power flows and allow generated power to be used closer tothe demand at the time. This is where Medium Voltage Direct Current (MVDC)solutions can play a part. Beyond just reactive power compensation emerging inthe MV environment, there are also benefits to being able to actively movepower from one network to another, thus helping to balance all networkparameters. SIPLINK provides a solution to do this and it can be easilydemonstrated that where reinforcement up-to sub-transmission levels arerequired, along with greater control; DC can provide significant benefits overthe lifetime of a network asset?s operation.Speaker: Bridgit Hartland-Johnson (EMMS PA APS)
name: SIPLINK ? Siemens MVDC solution for active power flow control on distribution level

description: OMNETRIC Group, opened for business one year ago, is dedicated to customers in the utilities sector helping themuse IT to better understand and leverage their operations data. Bringing together the worlds of operations and information technology we enable our customers to reconfigure business processes and see the benefits of data analytic to improve grid reliability and performance. Join the session to hear about why Siemens is uniquely positioned with OMNETRIC Group to have a meaningful discussion about integrated smart grid solutions for a more digital grid.  Speaker: Maikel van Verseveld (CEO Omnetric Group)
name: Let's get digital. How integrating operations and information technology can improve the outcomes

description: Hydrogen is one of the best answers to the question of how to make energy cleaner, more powerful, and more cost effective. It?s being used extensively in many industries today ? and the demand continues to grow.Speaker: Erik Wolf (PD LD HY S)
name: SILYZER 200 High-pressure electrolyzer in the MW range
